00074 #ifndef AT91_SPI_H
00075 #define AT91_SPI_H
00076 
00080 /*\{*/
00081 #define SPI_CR_OFF      0x00000000  ///< Control register offset.
00082 
00083 #define SPI_SPIEN                0  ///< SPI enable.
00084 #define SPI_SPIDIS               1  ///< SPI disable.
00085 #define SPI_SWRST                7  ///< Software reset.
00086 #define SPI_LASTXFER            24  ///< Last transfer.
00087 /*\}*/
00088 
00092 /*\{*/
00093 #define SPI_MR_OFF      0x00000004  ///< Mode register offset.
00094 
00095 #define SPI_MSTR                 0  ///< Master mode.
00096 #define SPI_PS                   1  ///< Peripheral select.
00097 #define SPI_PCSDEC               2 ///< Chip select decode.
00098 #define SPI_FDIV                 3  ///< Clock selection.
00099 #define SPI_MODFDIS              4  ///< Mode fault detection.
00100 #define SPI_LLB                  7  ///< Local loopback enable.
00101 #define SPI_PCS         0x000F0000  ///< Peripheral chip select mask.
00102 #define SPI_PCS_0       0x000E0000  ///< Peripheral chip select 0.
00103 #define SPI_PCS_1       0x000D0000  ///< Peripheral chip select 1.
00104 #define SPI_PCS_2       0x000B0000  ///< Peripheral chip select 2.
00105 #define SPI_PCS_3       0x00070000  ///< Peripheral chip select 3.
00106 #define SPI_PCS_SHIFT           16  ///< Least significant bit of peripheral chip select.
00107 #define SPI_DLYBCS      0xFF000000  ///< Mask for delay between chip selects.
00108 #define SPI_DLYBCS_SHIFT        24  ///< Least significant bit of delay between chip selects.
00109 /*\}*/
00110 
00114 /*\{*/
00115 #define SPI_RDR_OFF     0x00000008  ///< Receive data register offset.
00116 
00117 #define SPI_RD          0x0000FFFF  ///< Receive data mask.
00118 #define SPI_RD_SHIFT             0  ///< Least significant bit of receive data.
00119 /*\}*/
00120 
00124 /*\{*/
00125 #define SPI_TDR_OFF     0x0000000C  ///< Transmit data register offset.
00126 
00127 #define SPI_TD          0x0000FFFF  ///< Transmit data mask.
00128 #define SPI_TD_SHIFT             0  ///< Least significant bit of transmit data.
00129 /*\}*/
00130 
00134 /*\{*/
00135 #define SPI_SR_OFF      0x00000010  ///< Status register offset.
00136 #define SPI_IER_OFF     0x00000014  ///< Interrupt enable register offset.
00137 #define SPI_IDR_OFF     0x00000018  ///< Interrupt disable register offset.
00138 #define SPI_IMR_OFF     0x0000001C  ///< Interrupt mask register offset.
00139 
00140 #define SPI_RDRF                 0  ///< Receive data register full.
00141 #define SPI_TDRE                 1  ///< Transmit data register empty.
00142 #define SPI_MODF                 2  ///< Mode fault error.
00143 #define SPI_OVRES                3  ///< Overrun error status.
00144 #define SPI_ENDRX                4  ///< End of RX buffer.
00145 #define SPI_ENDTX                5  ///< End of TX buffer.
00146 #define SPI_RXBUFF               6  ///< RX buffer full.
00147 #define SPI_TXBUFE               7  ///< TX buffer empty.
00148 #define SPI_NSSR                 8  ///< NSS rising.
00149 #define SPI_TXEMPTY              9  ///< Transmission register empty.
00150 #define SPI_SPIENS              16  ///< SPI enable status.
00151 /*\}*/
00152 
00156 /*\{*/
00157 #define SPI_CSR0_OFF    0x00000030  ///< Chip select register 0 offset.
00158 #define SPI_CSR1_OFF    0x00000034  ///< Chip select register 1 offset.
00159 #define SPI_CSR2_OFF    0x00000038  ///< Chip select register 2 offset.
00160 #define SPI_CSR3_OFF    0x0000003C  ///< Chip select register 3 offset.
00161 
00162 #define SPI_CPOL                 0  ///< Clock polarity.
00163 #define SPI_NCPHA                1  ///< Clock phase.
00164 #define SPI_CSAAT                3  ///< Chip select active after transfer.
00165 #define SPI_BITS        0x000000F0  ///< Bits per transfer mask.
00166 #define SPI_BITS_8      0x00000000  ///< 8 bits per transfer.
00167 #define SPI_BITS_9      0x00000010  ///< 9 bits per transfer.
00168 #define SPI_BITS_10     0x00000020  ///< 10 bits per transfer.
00169 #define SPI_BITS_11     0x00000030  ///< 11 bits per transfer.
00170 #define SPI_BITS_12     0x00000040  ///< 12 bits per transfer.
00171 #define SPI_BITS_13     0x00000050  ///< 13 bits per transfer.
00172 #define SPI_BITS_14     0x00000060  ///< 14 bits per transfer.
00173 #define SPI_BITS_15     0x00000070  ///< 15 bits per transfer.
00174 #define SPI_BITS_16     0x00000080  ///< 16 bits per transfer.
00175 #define SPI_BITS_SHIFT           4  ///< Least significant bit of bits per transfer.
00176 #define SPI_SCBR        0x0000FF00  ///< Serial clock baud rate mask.
00177 #define SPI_SCBR_SHIFT           8  ///< Least significant bit of serial clock baud rate.
00178 #define SPI_DLYBS       0x00FF0000  ///< Delay before SPCK mask.
00179 #define SPI_DLYBS_SHIFT         16  ///< Least significant bit of delay before SPCK.
00180 #define SPI_DLYBCT      0xFF000000  ///< Delay between consecutive transfers mask.
00181 #define SPI_DLYBCT_SHIFT        24  ///< Least significant bit of delay between consecutive transfers.
00182 /*\}*/
00183 
00187 /*\{*/
00188 #if defined(SPI_BASE)
00189     #define SPI0_BASE   SPI_BASE
00190     #define SPI_CR      SPI0_CR     ///< SPI Control Register Write-only.
00191     #define SPI_MR      SPI0_MR     ///< SPI Mode Register Read/Write Reset=0x0.
00192     #define SPI_RDR     SPI0_RDR    ///< SPI Receive Data Register Read-only Reset=0x0.
00193     #define SPI_TDR     SPI0_TDR    ///< SPI Transmit Data Register Write-only .
00194     #define SPI_SR      SPI0_SR     ///< SPI Status Register Read-only Reset=0x000000F0.
00195     #define SPI_IER     SPI0_IER    ///< SPI Interrupt Enable Register Write-only.
00196     #define SPI_IDR     SPI0_IDR    ///< SPI Interrupt Disable Register Write-only.
00197     #define SPI_IMR     SPI0_IMR    ///< SPI Interrupt Mask Register Read-only Reset=0x0.
00198     #define SPI_CSR0    SPI0_CSR0   ///< SPI Chip Select Register 0 Read/Write Reset=0x0.
00199     #define SPI_CSR1    SPI0_CSR1   ///< SPI Chip Select Register 1 Read/Write Reset=0x0.
00200     #define SPI_CSR2    SPI0_CSR2   ///< SPI Chip Select Register 2 Read/Write Reset=0x0.
00201     #define SPI_CSR3    SPI0_CSR3   ///< SPI Chip Select Register 3 Read/Write Reset=0x0.
00202     #if defined(SPI_HAS_PDC)
00203         #define SPI_RPR     SPI0_RPR    ///< PDC channel 0 receive pointer register.
00204         #define SPI_RCR     SPI0_RCR    ///< PDC channel 0 receive counter register.
00205         #define SPI_TPR     SPI0_TPR    ///< PDC channel 0 transmit pointer register.
00206         #define SPI_TCR     SPI0_TCR    ///< PDC channel 0 transmit counter register.
00207         #define SPI_RNPR    SPI0_RNPR   ///< PDC channel 0 receive next pointer register.
00208         #define SPI_RNCR    SPI0_RNCR   ///< PDC channel 0 receive next counter register.
00209         #define SPI_TNPR    SPI0_TNPR   ///< PDC channel 0 transmit next pointer register.
00210         #define SPI_TNCR    SPI0_TNCR   ///< PDC channel 0 transmit next counter register.
00211         #define SPI_PTCR    SPI0_PTCR   ///< PDC channel 0 transfer control register.
00212         #define SPI_PTSR    SPI0_PTSR   ///< PDC channel 0 transfer status register.
00213     #endif /* SPI_HAS_PDC */
00214 #endif /* SPI_BASE */
00215 /*\}*/
00216 
00220 /*\{*/
00221 #if defined(SPI0_BASE)
00222     #define SPI0_CR     (*((reg32_t *)(SPI0_BASE + SPI_CR_OFF)))        ///< SPI Control Register Write-only.
00223     #define SPI0_MR     (*((reg32_t *)(SPI0_BASE + SPI_MR_OFF)))        ///< SPI Mode Register Read/Write Reset=0x0.
00224     #define SPI0_RDR    (*((reg32_t *)(SPI0_BASE + SPI_RDR_OFF)))       ///< SPI Receive Data Register Read-only Reset=0x0.
00225     #define SPI0_TDR    (*((reg32_t *)(SPI0_BASE + SPI_TDR_OFF)))       ///< SPI Transmit Data Register Write-only .
00226     #define SPI0_SR     (*((reg32_t *)(SPI0_BASE + SPI_SR_OFF)))        ///< SPI Status Register Read-only Reset=0x000000F0.
00227     #define SPI0_IER    (*((reg32_t *)(SPI0_BASE + SPI_IER_OFF)))       ///< SPI Interrupt Enable Register Write-only.
00228     #define SPI0_IDR    (*((reg32_t *)(SPI0_BASE + SPI_IDR_OFF)))       ///< SPI Interrupt Disable Register Write-only.
00229     #define SPI0_IMR    (*((reg32_t *)(SPI0_BASE + SPI_IMR_OFF)))       ///< SPI Interrupt Mask Register Read-only Reset=0x0.
00230     #define SPI0_CSR0   (*((reg32_t *)(SPI0_BASE + SPI_CSR0_OFF)))      ///< SPI Chip Select Register 0 Read/Write Reset=0x0.
00231     #define SPI0_CSR1   (*((reg32_t *)(SPI0_BASE + SPI_CSR1_OFF)))      ///< SPI Chip Select Register 1 Read/Write Reset=0x0.
00232     #define SPI0_CSR2   (*((reg32_t *)(SPI0_BASE + SPI_CSR2_OFF)))      ///< SPI Chip Select Register 2 Read/Write Reset=0x0.
00233     #define SPI0_CSR3   (*((reg32_t *)(SPI0_BASE + SPI_CSR3_OFF)))      ///< SPI Chip Select Register 3 Read/Write Reset=0x0.
00234     #if defined(SPI_HAS_PDC)
00235         #define SPI0_RPR    (*((reg32_t *)(SPI0_BASE + PERIPH_RPR_OFF)))    ///< PDC channel 0 receive pointer register.
00236         #define SPI0_RCR    (*((reg32_t *)(SPI0_BASE + PERIPH_RCR_OFF)))    ///< PDC channel 0 receive counter register.
00237         #define SPI0_TPR    (*((reg32_t *)(SPI0_BASE + PERIPH_TPR_OFF)))    ///< PDC channel 0 transmit pointer register.
00238         #define SPI0_TCR    (*((reg32_t *)(SPI0_BASE + PERIPH_TCR_OFF)))    ///< PDC channel 0 transmit counter register.
00239         #define SPI0_RNPR   (*((reg32_t *)(SPI0_BASE + PERIPH_RNPR_OFF)))   ///< PDC channel 0 receive next pointer register.
00240         #define SPI0_RNCR   (*((reg32_t *)(SPI0_BASE + PERIPH_RNCR_OFF)))   ///< PDC channel 0 receive next counter register.
00241         #define SPI0_TNPR   (*((reg32_t *)(SPI0_BASE + PERIPH_TNPR_OFF)))   ///< PDC channel 0 transmit next pointer register.
00242         #define SPI0_TNCR   (*((reg32_t *)(SPI0_BASE + PERIPH_TNCR_OFF)))   ///< PDC channel 0 transmit next counter register.
00243         #define SPI0_PTCR   (*((reg32_t *)(SPI0_BASE + PERIPH_PTCR_OFF)))   ///< PDC channel 0 transfer control register.
00244         #define SPI0_PTSR   (*((reg32_t *)(SPI0_BASE + PERIPH_PTSR_OFF)))   ///< PDC channel 0 transfer status register.
00245     #endif /* SPI_HAS_PDC */
00246 #endif /* SPI0_BASE */
00247 /*\}*/

00252 /*\{*/
00253 #if defined(SPI1_BASE)
00254     #define SPI1_CR     (*((reg32_t *)(SPI1_BASE + SPI_CR_OFF)))        ///< SPI Control Register Write-only.
00255     #define SPI1_MR     (*((reg32_t *)(SPI1_BASE + SPI_MR_OFF)))        ///< SPI Mode Register Read/Write Reset=0x0.
00256     #define SPI1_RDR    (*((reg32_t *)(SPI1_BASE + SPI_RDR_OFF)))       ///< SPI Receive Data Register Read-only Reset=0x0.
00257     #define SPI1_TDR    (*((reg32_t *)(SPI1_BASE + SPI_TDR_OFF)))       ///< SPI Transmit Data Register Write-only .
00258     #define SPI1_SR     (*((reg32_t *)(SPI1_BASE + SPI_SR_OFF)))        ///< SPI Status Register Read-only Reset=0x000000F0.
00259     #define SPI1_IER    (*((reg32_t *)(SPI1_BASE + SPI_IER_OFF)))       ///< SPI Interrupt Enable Register Write-only.
00260     #define SPI1_IDR    (*((reg32_t *)(SPI1_BASE + SPI_IDR_OFF)))       ///< SPI Interrupt Disable Register Write-only.
00261     #define SPI1_IMR    (*((reg32_t *)(SPI1_BASE + SPI_IMR_OFF)))       ///< SPI Interrupt Mask Register Read-only Reset=0x0.
00262     #define SPI1_CSR0   (*((reg32_t *)(SPI1_BASE + SPI_CSR0_OFF)))      ///< SPI Chip Select Register 0 Read/Write Reset=0x0.
00263     #define SPI1_CSR1   (*((reg32_t *)(SPI1_BASE + SPI_CSR1_OFF)))      ///< SPI Chip Select Register 1 Read/Write Reset=0x0.
00264     #define SPI1_CSR2   (*((reg32_t *)(SPI1_BASE + SPI_CSR2_OFF)))      ///< SPI Chip Select Register 2 Read/Write Reset=0x0.
00265     #define SPI1_CSR3   (*((reg32_t *)(SPI1_BASE + SPI_CSR3_OFF)))      ///< SPI Chip Select Register 3 Read/Write Reset=0x0.
00266     #if defined(SPI_HAS_PDC)
00267         #define SPI1_RPR    (*((reg32_t *)(SPI1_BASE + PERIPH_RPR_OFF)))    ///< PDC channel 1 receive pointer register.
00268         #define SPI1_RCR    (*((reg32_t *)(SPI1_BASE + PERIPH_RCR_OFF)))    ///< PDC channel 1 receive counter register.
00269         #define SPI1_TPR    (*((reg32_t *)(SPI1_BASE + PERIPH_TPR_OFF)))    ///< PDC channel 1 transmit pointer register.
00270         #define SPI1_TCR    (*((reg32_t *)(SPI1_BASE + PERIPH_TCR_OFF)))    ///< PDC channel 1 transmit counter register.
00271         #define SPI1_RNPR   (*((reg32_t *)(SPI1_BASE + PERIPH_RNPR_OFF)))   ///< PDC channel 1 receive next pointer register.
00272         #define SPI1_RNCR   (*((reg32_t *)(SPI1_BASE + PERIPH_RNCR_OFF)))   ///< PDC channel 1 receive next counter register.
00273         #define SPI1_TNPR   (*((reg32_t *)(SPI1_BASE + PERIPH_TNPR_OFF)))   ///< PDC channel 1 transmit next pointer register.
00274         #define SPI1_TNCR   (*((reg32_t *)(SPI1_BASE + PERIPH_TNCR_OFF)))   ///< PDC channel 1 transmit next counter register.
00275         #define SPI1_PTCR   (*((reg32_t *)(SPI1_BASE + PERIPH_PTCR_OFF)))   ///< PDC channel 1 transfer control register.
00276         #define SPI1_PTSR   (*((reg32_t *)(SPI1_BASE + PERIPH_PTSR_OFF)))   ///< PDC channel 1 transfer status register.
00277     #endif /* SPI_HAS_PDC */
00278 #endif /* SPI1_BASE */
00279 /*\}*/
